Articles.Content:
Ahead, actually, I'm in New Zealand. That tiny place no-one knows about. Although I am english.

I thought you were setting up corgi???

I think everyones computers are potatoes(Including myself)

Mine's actually pretty good. Only a few months old, and custom built.

Who wants to fight planes?
MEEEE. i want to fight first. Im setting up for Death but i have a lot of time before hes ready.

MEEEE. i want to fight first. Im setting up for Death but i have a lot of time before hes ready.

You know planes don't really fight without multi-player mod, right?

Sorry daemon, but I cant right now. I will look into that mod, but it seems pretty unstable, and I am not sure how my cpu would handle it, being a psuedo-Quad core. (Quad core with two spinning cores or something, according to the manufacturer)

EDIT: funnilly enough I am in english right now, but I have nothing to do with exams the week after next so I am just sitting here, watching and posting on this thread.

Edited October 29, 2013 by Deathsoul097
Ok. do i need to get rid of any other mods for it to work with you? And i want to build one as well
I can extract my current mods for now and put them back at a later date
Ok How do we join each other?
Wow, triple post.

Ok How do we join each other?

No idea. Still building my plane.
Someone answer me. Deamon.... im waiting on your reply so we can join. I deinstalled my mods and installed the Multiplayer.
As far as I am aware, the mod adds a new gametype, meaning you may need to start a new save. However, I am not too sure though, having only found out about it yesterday.
Deamon. We can still join each other. And my KSP wont stop with music and its annoying me. Can you start a server of some sort for it?

Deamon. We can still join each other. And my KSP wont stop with music and its annoying me. Can you start a server of some sort for it?

Turn off the music. It'll be awhile. Like hours probably.
Does anyone wanna have a Kerbin system battle (because I suck at interplanetary stuffs. )?
Il be gone by then. Cant you just start a server so we can both build in the world? Since I wont have my saves.

Roket turtle sure

but you would need the ksp multiplayer mod

and you set up since idk how.
Multiplayer mod? This is just a pass the save battle...
Ok. Then you set it up k?

Hm... I may need some time... I REALLY need to make better missiles...

Edited October 29, 2013 by RocketTurtle

Kerbin, as this is mostly a plane and missile thing.

.

Do you not have any space naval ship?
Bu wait. What is this multiplayer mod you speak of?

Attention

Mods which affect persistence or craft files are not allowed...with one exception,TehGimp666 creator of build,fly,dream has recently released a multiplayer mod known as KMP .If both parties have this mod and agree to use it that is allowed.This will allow for air to air,surface to air,anything else to air combat and use for high TWR and generally being faster(Zekes).This allowance will greatly change the outcome of most battles tipping the scale away from slow hard hitters and toward lighter craft,So get building:)

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/55835-Kmp-0-22-wip-alpha

This is the multiplayer mod.
Okay, that's cool, nevermind, I wanna do a plane and boat battle now!

... well I made a ion spy plane...

(clickable pics FTW)

I call it the Ion Space/Spy Plane(ISP) VX-2V

The ISP VX-2X has a ton of range due to the usage of 3 ion engines(no part cliping needed) it also has good maneuverability for it's wing class(just don't roll and pitch up at the same time) it is also relativly quick off the runway due to SRB assisted takeoff.

It has 2 modes of flight powered or gliding. For powered follow the instructions in the discription. For gliding only throttal up to 1/2 and let the SRBs burn all the way out.(warning must fly in stright line after detaching SRBs for gliding mode)

Craft File: here
